committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to cost-sharing rules of the Missouri National Recreation Area.

summary.text: Reinstates the originally authorized cost-sharing rules of the Missouri National Recreation River, Nebraska and South Dakota. Requires cost-sharing ambiguities to be resolved according to National Park Service policies as applied to units of the Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to cost-sharing rules of the Missouri National Recreation Area.
